text:
......What is it?
If you have something to say, please keep it brief.

Oh, well... I heard from the dance teacher
that everyone's dancing has improved.

Everyone's dancing has improved, apparently.
So the performance should be fine.

...So, are you telling me to come up with
ideas for the live performance?

Haha...
I'm not forcing you to do anything.

Oh, right.
Hinana's notebook arrived from Toru.

If it's about that, we could probably use it for
the live performance after some adjustments.

...Is that so?
I don't understand why you're telling me.
I just thought maybe Hinana was worried too.

I'm not opposed to
giving opinions or anything.

Improving the content of the live
performance is a good thing, so...

Yeah,
I don't think you're against it either.

Everyone's working hard
to make it a good live performance.

Whether you approve or not,
it doesn't matter.
